scripts.compile_cjs: tsc dist/cjs/src/index.ts dist/cjs/src/proxy/index.ts -m commonjs --outDir dist/cjs --sourcemap --target ES5 -d --diagnostics --pretty --strict --skipLibCheck --noImplicitReturns --noUnusedLocals --noUnusedParameters --strict --suppressImplicitAnyIndexErrors --moduleResolution node --noEmitHelpers --importHelpers --lib es5,es2015,es2016,es2017
scripts.compile_module_es: tsc dist/es/src/index.ts dist/es/src/proxy/index.ts   -m ES2015   --outDir dist/es  --sourcemap --target ES5 -d --diagnostics --pretty --strict --skipLibCheck --noImplicitReturns --noUnusedLocals --noUnusedParameters --strict --suppressImplicitAnyIndexErrors --moduleResolution node --noEmitHelpers --importHelpers --lib es5,es2015,es2016,es2017
scripts.cover: rm -rf ./.nyc_output ./coverage && cross-env NODE_ENV=test nyc --reporter=html --reporter=lcov --exclude=node_modules --exclude=spec-js/test --exclude=spec-js/src/storage/lovefield.js --exclude=spec-js/src/shared/Logger.js --exclude=spec-js/src/utils/option.js --exclude=spec-js/src/utils/valid.js --exclude=spec-js/src/addons/aggresive-optimizer.js tman --mocha spec-js/test/run.js && nyc report
scripts.test: npm run lint && NODE_ENV=test tman --mocha spec-js/test/run.js
scripts.test_O1: npm run lint && NODE_ENV=test optimize=true tman --mocha spec-js/test/run.js
scripts.watch: cross-env NODE_ENV=test ts-node ./tools/watch.ts & npm run watch_test
scripts.watch_cjs: tsc src/index.ts -m commonjs --outDir dist --sourcemap --target ES5 -d --diagnostics --pretty --strict --noImplicitReturns --suppressImplicitAnyIndexErrors --moduleResolution node --noEmitHelpers --lib es5,es2015,es2016,es2017 -w
